name: makeBy
signature: { <A>(f: (i: number) => A): (n: number) => NonEmptyChunk<A>; <A>(n: number, f: (i: number) => A): NonEmptyChunk<A>; }
description:
Return a Chunk of length n with element i initialized with f(i).
*Note. `n` is normalized to an integer >= 1.
documentation:
Return a Chunk of length n with element i initialized with f(i).
*Note**. `n` is normalized to an integer >= 1.
